scripts.build: npm run build:getChat && npm run build:getConversation && npm run build:deleteConversation && npm run build:postChat
scripts.build:getChat: tsc src/getChat/index.ts --outDir build/getChat && cp -r node_modules build/getChat/node_modules
scripts.build:getConversation: tsc src/getConversation/index.ts --outDir build/getConversation && cp -r node_modules build/getConversation/node_modules
scripts.build:deleteConversation: tsc src/deleteConversation/index.ts --outDir build/deleteConversation && cp -r node_modules build/deleteConversation/node_modules
scripts.build:postChat: tsc src/postChat/index.ts --outDir build/postChat && cp -r node_modules build/postChat/node_modules
